title: Peptide and Protein Quantification via Stable Isotope Labelling (SIL)
questions: How to quantify based on MS1 features?
How to map MS1 features to MS2 identifications?
How to evaluate and optimize the results?
objectives: MS1 feature quantitation and mapping of quantitations to peptide and protein IDs.
key_points: Peptides labelled with stable isotopes result in multiple parallel MS1 ion traces.
MS1 features can be used for relative protein quantitation.
Quantitations have to be mapped to PSMs.
PSM quantitations can be used to calculate protein quantitations.
Proper quantitation and mapping needs careful evaluation and optimization.

workflows.name: Proteomics: Peptide and Protein Quantification via stable istobe labeling
workflows.title: Proteomics: Peptide and Protein Quantification via stable istobe labeling
